document.full_text: the european union filed an appeal against an aircraft subsidies ruling on friday just hours after calling it a victory, a tactical move in a transatlantic game of global trade chess.
document.title: eu files tactical appeal in boeing trade spat
lines_and_colors: the european union filed an appeal against an aircraft subsidies ruling on friday just hours after calling it a victory, a tactical move in a transatlantic game of global trade chess.
